value.title: StarCraft 2: The NEW Best Protoss?!
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between MaxPax (Protoss) and Ragnarok (Zerg).  MaxPax recently overtook herO for the rank 1 position of Protoss players on Aligulac. value.title: StarCraft 2: The UNEXPECTED Result! (Maru vs Harstem)
value.excerpt: Very fun match of professional StarCraft 2 between Maru and Harstem. While most of the time we see Protoss players forced into Colossus because of Marine Marauder unit compositions, in this game Harstem decides to go for Carriers with Disruptors because of Maru's Mech army.
